english.segment1: Lord of all creation. Of water, earth and sky. The heavens are your tabernacle. Glory to the Lord on High. (Chorus). God of Wonders. Beyond our galaxy. You are holy. Holy
english.segment2: The universe declares your majesty. You are holy-holy
english.segment3: Lord of heaven and earth. Lord of heaven and earth
english.segment4: Early in the morning. I will celebrate the light. When I stumble in the darkness. I will call your name by night
english.segment6: Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth. Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth. Hallelujah to the Lord of heaven and earth
